mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fbcomment (writer, content, boardNo, writeDate) VALUES (#{writer}, #{content}, #{boardNo}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT f.*, m.name writerName, (SELECT COUNT(likesNo) FROM fbcommentlikes WHERE commentNo = f.commentNo AND memberId = #{memberId}) commentLikesNum FROM fbcomment f INNER JOIN member m ON f.writer = m.memberId WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo} ORDER BY commentNo
